title: Quarkus 3.1.0.Final released - Programmatic creation of Reactive REST Clients, Kotlin 1.8.21 and more
content: It has been a month since we released Quarkus 3.0 and it is our pleasure to announce Quarkus 3.1.0.Final. As usual, it comes with a lot of improvements all over the place. Major changes are: Provide new API to programmatically create Reactive REST Clients Introduce a way to set headers...
